txt.en: Cánnakh can be found in Aughaire.\n\nYou should speak with Cánnakh.
Foul, ancient evil from The Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu has made its way to the surface of Angmar, including Khruthakh, who scouts these lands for a lost power.
Khruthakh can be found somewhere in Angmar.\n\nYou should defeat Khruthakh.

'Another creature of the darkness falls. What I wouldn't give to study some of that ancient armour.\n\n'I know, it is too much of a risk as the armour was most likely forged and corrupted by an ancient darkness. I would not want to corrupt myself in the process of studying those dark metals.'

'Khruthakh is most likely a Wight of sorts. This being may be under the control of Ulkharn or some other ancient evil dwelling in the depths of The Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu.\n\n'This ancient armour, animated by the darkness of Nûrz Ghâshu searches for something. If we are looking for the same object, this creature should be dealt with soon! My research continues.'
